00027 #define           AIM_FI_NUM_MUHSHOTS_X         8
00028 #define           AIM_FI_NUM_MUHSHOTS_Y         5
00029

00031 #define           AIM_FI_PORTRAIT_HEIGHT  48
00032

00034 #define           AIM_FI_FIRST_MUGSHOT_Y  IMAGE_OFFSET_Y + 69//67//70 //68 //65
00035 #define           AIM_FI_MUGSHOT_GAP_X          10
00036 #define           AIM_FI_MUGSHOT_GAP_Y          13
00037 #define           AIM_FI_FACE_OFFSET                  2
00038

00040 #define           AIM_FI_NNAME_OFFSET_Y         AIM_FI_PORTRAIT_HEIGHT+1
00041 #define           AIM_FI_NNAME_WIDTH                  AIM_FI_PORTRAIT_WIDTH+4
00042

00045 #define           AIM_FI_MEMBER_TEXT_WIDTH      190

00072 BOOLEAN EnterAimFacialIndex()
00073 {
00074   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00075       UINT8 i;
00076       UINT16            usPosX, usPosY, x,y;
00077       STR                     sFaceLoc = "FACES\\";
00078       char              sTemp[100];
00079 
00080       // load the Portait graphic and add it
00081       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00082       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\MugShotBorder3.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00083       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMugShotBorder));
00084 
00085       usPosX = AIM_FI_FIRST_MUGSHOT_X;
00086       usPosY = AIM_FI_FIRST_MUGSHOT_Y;
00087       i=0;
00088       for(y=0; y<AIM_FI_NUM_MUHSHOTS_Y; y++)
00089       {
00090             for(x=0; x<AIM_FI_NUM_MUHSHOTS_X; x++)
00091             {
00092 
00093                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMercFaceMouseRegions[ i ], usPosX, usPosY, (INT16)(usPosX + AIM_FI_PORTRAIT_WIDTH), (INT16)(usPosY + AIM_FI_PORTRAIT_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00094                                                  CURSOR_WWW, SelectMercFaceMoveRegionCallBack, SelectMercFaceRegionCallBack); 
00095                   // Add region
00096                   MSYS_AddRegion( &gMercFaceMouseRegions[ i ] );
00097                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMercFaceMouseRegions[ i ], 0, i);
00098 
00099                   sprintf(sTemp, "%s%02d.sti", sFaceLoc, AimMercArray[i]);
00100                   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00101                   FilenameForBPP(sTemp, VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00102                   if( !AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiAimFiFace[i]) )
00103                         return( FALSE );
00104 
00105                   
00106                   usPosX += AIM_FI_PORTRAIT_WIDTH + AIM_FI_MUGSHOT_GAP_X;
00107                   i++;
00108             }
00109             usPosX = AIM_FI_FIRST_MUGSHOT_X;
00110             usPosY += AIM_FI_PORTRAIT_HEIGHT + AIM_FI_MUGSHOT_GAP_Y;
00111       }
00112 
00113       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gScreenMouseRegions, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y, LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH-1,
00114                                      CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectScreenRegionCallBack); 
00115       // Add region
00116       MSYS_AddRegion( &gScreenMouseRegions );
00117 
00118 
00119       InitAimMenuBar();
00120       InitAimDefaults();
00121 
00122       RenderAimFacialIndex();
00123 
00124       return( TRUE );
00125 }
00126 
00127 void ExitAimFacialIndex()
00128 {
00129       UINT8 i;
00130 
00131       RemoveAimDefaults();
00132 
00133       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMugShotBorder);
00134 
00135 
00136       for(i=0; i<MAX_NUMBER_MERCS; i++)
00137       {
00138             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiAimFiFace[i]);
00139         MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gMercFaceMouseRegions[ i ]);
00140       }
00141       ExitAimMenuBar();
00142 
00143   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gScreenMouseRegions);
00144 }

00153 BOOLEAN RenderAimFacialIndex()
00154 {
00155       UINT16            usPosX, usPosY, x,y;
00156       wchar_t           sString[150];
00157       UINT8             i;
00158 
00159       DrawAimDefaults();
00160 
00161       //Display the 'A.I.M. Members Sorted Ascending By Price' type string
00162       if( gubCurrentListMode == AIM_ASCEND )
00163             swprintf(sString, AimFiText[ AIM_FI_AIM_MEMBERS_SORTED_ASCENDING ], AimFiText[gubCurrentSortMode] );
00164       else
00165             swprintf(sString, AimFiText[ AIM_FI_AIM_MEMBERS_SORTED_DESCENDING ], AimFiText[gubCurrentSortMode] );
00166 
00167       DrawTextToScreen(sString, AIM_FI_MEMBER_TEXT_X, AIM_FI_MEMBER_TEXT_Y, AIM_FI_MEMBER_TEXT_WIDTH, AIM_MAINTITLE_FONT, AIM_MAINTITLE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );                
00168 
00169 
00170       //Draw the mug shot border and face
00171       usPosX = AIM_FI_FIRST_MUGSHOT_X;
00172       usPosY = AIM_FI_FIRST_MUGSHOT_Y;
00173 
00174       i=0;
00175       for(y=0; y<AIM_FI_NUM_MUHSHOTS_Y; y++)
00176       {
00177             for(x=0; x<AIM_FI_NUM_MUHSHOTS_X; x++)
00178             {
00179                   DrawMercsFaceToScreen(i, usPosX, usPosY, 1);
00180                   DrawTextToScreen(gMercProfiles[AimMercArray[i]].zNickname, (UINT16)(usPosX - AIM_FI_NNAME_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY + AIM_FI_NNAME_OFFSET_Y), AIM_FI_NNAME_WIDTH, AIM_FONT12ARIAL, AIM_FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );                
00181             
00182                   usPosX += AIM_FI_PORTRAIT_WIDTH + AIM_FI_MUGSHOT_GAP_X;
00183                   i++;
00184             }
00185             usPosX = AIM_FI_FIRST_MUGSHOT_X;
00186             usPosY += AIM_FI_PORTRAIT_HEIGHT + AIM_FI_MUGSHOT_GAP_Y;
00187       }
00188 
00189       DisableAimButton();
00190 
00191       //display the 'left and right click' onscreen help msg
00192       DrawTextToScreen(AimFiText[AIM_FI_LEFT_CLICK], AIM_FI_LEFT_CLICK_TEXT_X, AIM_FI_LEFT_CLICK_TEXT_Y, AIM_FI_CLICK_TEXT_WIDTH, AIM_FI_HELP_TITLE_FONT, AIM_FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED   );                
00193       DrawTextToScreen(AimFiText[AIM_FI_TO_SELECT], AIM_FI_LEFT_CLICK_TEXT_X, AIM_FI_LEFT_CLICK_TEXT_Y+AIM_FI_CLICK_DESC_TEXT_Y_OFFSET, AIM_FI_CLICK_TEXT_WIDTH, AIM_FI_HELP_FONT, AIM_FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED  );                
00194 
00195       DrawTextToScreen(AimFiText[AIM_FI_RIGHT_CLICK], AIM_FI_RIGHT_CLICK_TEXT_X, AIM_FI_LEFT_CLICK_TEXT_Y, AIM_FI_CLICK_TEXT_WIDTH, AIM_FI_HELP_TITLE_FONT, AIM_FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );                
00196       DrawTextToScreen(AimFiText[AIM_FI_TO_ENTER_SORT_PAGE], AIM_FI_RIGHT_CLICK_TEXT_X, AIM_FI_LEFT_CLICK_TEXT_Y+AIM_FI_CLICK_DESC_TEXT_Y_OFFSET, AIM_FI_CLICK_TEXT_WIDTH, AIM_FI_HELP_FONT, AIM_FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED    );                
00197 
00198   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00199 
00200   RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00201 
00202       InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00203       return(TRUE);
00204 }
00205 
00206 void SelectMercFaceRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00207 { 
00208       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00209       {
00210       }
00211       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00212       {
00213             guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS;
00214             gbCurrentIndex = (UINT8) MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00215       }
00216       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00217       {
00218             guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS_SORTED_FILES;
00219       } 
00220 }
00221 
00222 
00223 void SelectScreenRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00224 { 
00225       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00226       {
00227       }
00228       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00229       {
00230             guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS_SORTED_FILES;
00231       }
00232 }

00234 
00235 void SelectMercFaceMoveRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 reason )
00236 {
00237       UINT8 ubMercNum;
00238       UINT16 usPosX, usPosY;
00239       UINT16 ty1, ty2, tx1, tx2;
00240 
00241       ubMercNum = (UINT8) MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00242 
00243       ty1 = AIM_FI_FIRST_MUGSHOT_Y;
00244       ty2 = (AIM_FI_PORTRAIT_HEIGHT + AIM_FI_MUGSHOT_GAP_Y);
00245 
00246       tx1 = AIM_FI_FIRST_MUGSHOT_X;
00247       tx2 = (AIM_FI_PORTRAIT_WIDTH + AIM_FI_MUGSHOT_GAP_X);
00248 
00249       usPosY = ubMercNum / AIM_FI_NUM_MUHSHOTS_X;
00250       usPosY = AIM_FI_FIRST_MUGSHOT_Y + (AIM_FI_PORTRAIT_HEIGHT + AIM_FI_MUGSHOT_GAP_Y) * usPosY;
00251 
00252       usPosX = ubMercNum % AIM_FI_NUM_MUHSHOTS_X;
00253       usPosX = AIM_FI_FIRST_MUGSHOT_X + (AIM_FI_PORTRAIT_WIDTH + AIM_FI_MUGSHOT_GAP_X) * usPosX;
00254 
00255 //    fReDrawNewMailFlag = TRUE;
00256 
00257       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
00258       {
00259             pRegion->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00260             DrawMercsFaceToScreen(ubMercNum, usPosX, usPosY, 1);
00261             InvalidateRegion(pRegion->RegionTopLeftX, pRegion->RegionTopLeftY, pRegion->RegionBottomRightX, pRegion->RegionBottomRightY);
00262       }
00263       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
00264       {
00265             pRegion->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON ;
00266             DrawMercsFaceToScreen(ubMercNum, usPosX, usPosY, 0);
00267             InvalidateRegion(pRegion->RegionTopLeftX, pRegion->RegionTopLeftY, pRegion->RegionBottomRightX, pRegion->RegionBottomRightY);
00268       }
00269 } 
00270 
00271 BOOLEAN DrawMercsFaceToScreen(UINT8 ubMercID, UINT16 usPosX, UINT16 usPosY, UINT8 ubImage)
00272 {
00273   HVOBJECT  hMugShotBorderHandle;
00274       HVOBJECT    hFaceHandle;
00275       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier=NULL;
00276 
00277       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( AimMercArray[ubMercID], TRUE );
00278 
00279 
00280       //Blt the portrait background
00281       GetVideoObject(&hMugShotBorderHandle, guiMugShotBorder);
00282       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hMugShotBorderHandle, ubImage,usPosX, usPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00283 
00284       //Blt face to screen
00285       GetVideoObject(&hFaceHandle, guiAimFiFace[ubMercID]);
00286       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hFaceHandle, 0,usPosX+AIM_FI_FACE_OFFSET, usPosY+AIM_FI_FACE_OFFSET, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00287 
00288       if( IsMercDead( AimMercArray[ubMercID] ) )
00289       {
00290             //get the face object
00291             GetVideoObject(&hFaceHandle, guiAimFiFace[ubMercID]);
00292 
00293             //if the merc is dead
00294             //shade the face red, (to signif that he is dead)
00295             hFaceHandle->pShades[ 0 ]           = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( hFaceHandle->pPaletteEntry, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_RED, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_GREEN, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_BLUE, TRUE );
00296 
00297             //set the red pallete to the face
00298             SetObjectHandleShade( guiAimFiFace[ubMercID], 0 );
00299 
00300             //Blt face to screen 
00301             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hFaceHandle, 0,usPosX+AIM_FI_FACE_OFFSET, usPosY+AIM_FI_FACE_OFFSET, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00302       
00303             DrawTextToScreen(AimFiText[AIM_FI_DEAD], (UINT16)(usPosX+AIM_FI_AWAY_TEXT_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY+AIM_FI_AWAY_TEXT_OFFSET_Y), AIM_FI_AWAY_TEXT_OFFSET_WIDTH, FONT10ARIAL, 145, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED  );
00304       }
00305 
00306       //else if the merc is currently a POW or, the merc was fired as a pow
00307       else if( gMercProfiles[ AimMercArray[ubMercID] ].bMercStatus == MERC_FIRED_AS_A_POW  || ( pSoldier &&  pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) )
00308       {
00309             ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, usPosX+AIM_FI_FACE_OFFSET, usPosY+AIM_FI_FACE_OFFSET, usPosX + 48+AIM_FI_FACE_OFFSET, usPosY + 43+AIM_FI_FACE_OFFSET);
00310             DrawTextToScreen( pPOWStrings[0], (UINT16)(usPosX+AIM_FI_AWAY_TEXT_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY+AIM_FI_AWAY_TEXT_OFFSET_Y), AIM_FI_AWAY_TEXT_OFFSET_WIDTH, FONT10ARIAL, 145, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED   );
00311       }
00312 
00313       //if the merc is on our team
00314       else if( pSoldier != NULL )
00315       {
00316             ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, usPosX+AIM_FI_FACE_OFFSET, usPosY+AIM_FI_FACE_OFFSET, usPosX + 48+AIM_FI_FACE_OFFSET, usPosY + 43+AIM_FI_FACE_OFFSET);
00317             DrawTextToScreen( MercInfo[MERC_FILES_ALREADY_HIRED], (UINT16)(usPosX+AIM_FI_AWAY_TEXT_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY+AIM_FI_AWAY_TEXT_OFFSET_Y), AIM_FI_AWAY_TEXT_OFFSET_WIDTH, FONT10ARIAL, 145, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00318       }
00319 
00320       //if the merc is away, shadow his/her face and blit 'away' over top
00321       else if( !IsMercHireable( AimMercArray[ubMercID] ) )
00322       {
00323             ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, usPosX+AIM_FI_FACE_OFFSET, usPosY+AIM_FI_FACE_OFFSET, usPosX + 48+AIM_FI_FACE_OFFSET, usPosY + 43+AIM_FI_FACE_OFFSET);
00324             DrawTextToScreen( AimFiText[AIM_FI_DEAD+1], (UINT16)(usPosX+AIM_FI_AWAY_TEXT_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY+AIM_FI_AWAY_TEXT_OFFSET_Y), AIM_FI_AWAY_TEXT_OFFSET_WIDTH, FONT10ARIAL, 145, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED     );
00325             //if not enough room use this..
00326             //AimFiText[AIM_FI_AWAY]
00327       }
00328 
00329       return(TRUE);
00330 }
